title: 0.8.2 broken on Windows (ASI fails to load and then auto-deletes itself)
body:
See title, release 0.8.2 is broken on Windows.

0.8.1 works fine.
author: zandm7

comments.body: If you're using an antivirus, it could be flagging the asi file as a false positive and moving it to quarantine.
Yeah its not broken for me, works flawlessly
It works for me on Windows.
As @MYSTICALMUSICAL said, it's likely being flagged and deleted by Defender. See #68. You'll need to add it as an exception in Defender to stop it from being deleted.

Thanks, adding an exception in Windows Defender fixed it!

I didn't think that was the issue, as normally Defender tells me when it removes a suspicious file, but this time it did not...

satisfaction_conditions: Identifies the root cause of ASI file auto-deletion on Windows
Provides guidance for configuring antivirus/file protection exceptions
Addresses silent file removal without user notifications
Differentiates between software version compatibility issues and external system interference

title: Models dissapearing and everthing black when in combat (Kreigant Castle)
body: Entire scene is black when you get into battle in Kriegante Castle. Removing the fix, fixed the problem. didnt change any options in the .ini except for remove dash blur. Thanks for what you do!
author: Abanthi

comments.body: Should be fixed in v0.7.9 if you want to give it a try.

satisfaction_conditions: Resolves the black screen and missing models during combat in Kriegante Castle
Addresses the root cause without requiring manual .ini file adjustments
Provides a permanent solution through official updates rather than temporary fixes
